The designation means they have the team, tools, and experience necessary to diagnose and treat potentially deadly heart attacks, strokes, and trauma. The designations are part of Idaho’s Time Sensitive Emergency System, which was created to help address the top three preventable causes of death. Hospitals must undergo a rigorous review process and site inspection in order to earn these designations. Our team started working on our stroke, heart attack and trauma programs in June of 2020.

Description: Creating autonomous sensing platforms to unlock a new perspective on our oceans.
Full Description: Our understanding of the ocean is limited by our ability to observe.  Satellites can only scratch the surface of our oceans and manned survey ships are prohibitively expensive.  We need sensing platforms that can place sensors deep into the ocean's twilight zone to collect valuable data.  Second Star Robotics creates autonomous ocean observer platforms that can be deployed at scale at extremely low cost.  Our long-endurance ocean observer platforms dive deep into the water column and ride oceanic currents to save power.  We have developed several foundational technologies which enable practitioners to deploy sensors into the water column over days or months.

Headquarters Location: New City, New York, United States
Description: Logic Pro is a creative tool for professional songwriting, beat-making, editing, and mixing.
Full Description: Logic Pro is a digital audio workstation software designed by Apple Inc. It's used by music producers, sound designers, and audio engineers to create, edit, and mix music. If you're interested in downloading Logic Pro, there are a few things you need to know first. In this article, we'll cover everything you need to know about Logic Pro download, including system requirements, installation process, features, and more. + System Requirements Before downloading Logic Pro, make sure your Mac meets the system requirements. Logic Pro requires macOS 10.14.6 or later and a Mac with a 64-bit processor. Here are the detailed system requirements: 1. macOS 10.15.7 or later 2. 4GB of RAM (8GB or more recommended) 3. 64-bit processor 4. 1280x768 resolution display or higher 5. 6GB of disk space for a minimum installation or 72GB of disk space for a full Sound Library installation 6. If your Mac doesn't meet these requirements, you won't be able to download and install Logic Pro. + How to Download Logic Pro To download Logic Pro, follow these steps: Go to the Apple website and navigate to the Logic Pro product page. Click on the "Buy" button to purchase Logic Pro. If you already own Logic Pro, skip to step 4. Sign in with your Apple ID and complete the payment process. Open the App Store on your Mac and go to the "Updates" tab. Click on the "Update" button next to Logic Pro to start the download and installation process. + Features of Logic Pro Logic Pro is packed with features that make it one of the best digital audio workstations on the market. Here are some of the standout features: 1. Flex Time and Flex Pitch Flex Time and Flex Pitch allow you to manipulate the timing and pitch of audio recordings. This is especially useful for fixing mistakes or making creative changes to a recording. 2. Drummer Drummer is a virtual session player that can create realistic drum tracks. You can choose from different drummers and styles, and Drummer will automatically generate drum tracks that fit your project. 3. Alchemy Alchemy is a powerful synthesizer that comes with Logic Pro. It has a wide range of sounds and is capable of creating complex textures and evolving soundscapes. 4. Smart Tempo Smart Tempo allows you to record without a click track and automatically match the timing of your recordings to the tempo of your project. This makes it easier to record natural performances without worrying about timing. 5. Logic Remote Logic Remote is an app that allows you to control Logic Pro using your iPad or iPhone. This is useful for recording or mixing from a distance or for controlling Logic Pro while you're away from your Mac.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Software

Description: Regulatory Compliance Services and Loss Prevention Solutions for the Retail, Pharma & Cannabis industries.
Full Description: The Integritus Group is comprised of The Pharma Compliance Group (PCG), C1 Compliance (Cannabis and Hemp) and Retail Integrity Solutions.  Our Mission: To Promote an Organizational Culture of Integrity and Trust that Encourages Ethical Conduct and a Commitment to Overall Compliance. Experience Matters: Our executive team and strategic advisors each have multiple decades of real-world experience holding executive leadership positions in these industries and are committed to protecting your brands and building lifelong partnerships as trusted advisors. Retail Integrity Solutions understands the crucial aspect loss prevention, audit and safety play in a profitable company. To meet these challenging goals our team provides a holistic approach to total retail loss. We provide a complete outsource solution or a co-source model to support existing departments.  Our Objective Retail Integrity Solutions understands the crucial aspect loss prevention, audit and safety play in a profitable company. To meet these challenging goals our team provides a holistic approach to total retail loss.  Our objective is to protect your companies profits and improve your overall performance. As experts in loss prevention, operations and risk we build custom solutions that fits your needs not ours. We provide an experienced nationwide team of experts to execute all functions of a successful program with the focus on earnings improvement.  TIG Solutions TIG understands the crucial aspect loss prevention, audit and safety play in a profitable company. To meet these challenging goals our team provides a holistic approach to total retail loss. Our objective is to protect your companies profits and improve your overall performance. As experts in loss prevention, operations and risk we build custom solutions that fits your needs not ours. We provide an experienced nationwide team of experts to execute all functions of a successful program with the focus on earnings improvement.  Most importantly we work with you and your team to educate all levels on how to run a profitable business.  Retail Solutions Include - Compliance/Audit Programs: Develop and provide compliance/audit programs to examine the specific areas of risk at store level and evaluates the effectiveness of current controls and/or standards.  Investigative Consulting Services: Provide In-person as well as remote telephone and video Investigative loss Interviews to resolve business abuse within the workplace.  Training & Awareness Programs: Provide awareness material with a focus towards training on loss prevention, workplace safety and core business values across all levels of the organization.  Exception Based Reporting Support: Provide analysis of data from datasets developed specifically for your company using your exception-based reporting software.  Distribution / Fulfillment Center Assessments: Conduct an assessment of your distribution and/or fulfillment centers to support the prevention of potential inventory loss through your facilities.  Policy & Procedure Development Support: Review, recommend and support you in the development of policies and procedures related to inventory control, cash handling, loss prevention and other related controls.  Employment Background & Drug Screening: Provide a variety of pre-employment background screening and drug screening programs.  Loss Prevention Operational Consulting Assessment: Provide your company with a comprehensive analysis and subsequent recommendations for improving both your overall loss prevention program and to make recommendations that will improve your results and assist you in achieving your shortage control goals.  Retail Vertical Markets: Food & Beverage.  Grocery & Convenience:  Specialty Retail.  Mystery Shops: Inspect what you expect - The mystery shopping programs we offer can help you identify what your associates are doing well and areas they need to work on.  Risk Assessments for Active Shooter/Workplace Violence Preparedness: Provide your organization with a comprehensive risk/safety assessment and provide feedback on how equipped you are to mitigate risk in your business.   The Pharma Compliance Group (PCG) The industry leader in pharmacy compliance services. PCG is a full-service company committed to assisting pharma companies comply with state and federal regulations, avoid costly fines, legal difficulties, as well as damage to your brand and reputation.  The Pharma Compliance Group is committed to you.  Manufacturers, distributors, pharmacies, practitioners and healthcare facilities have a responsibility to protect the pharmaceutical supply chain.  Sophisticated criminals will divert controlled substances and breach your security. As millions battle prescription drug misuse and abuse, controlled substance diversion is a threat to public health and safety.  That’s why you need comprehensive policies in place to prevent diversion.  In fact, fines and penalties have increased dramatically over the last few years. Don’t risk your business by practicing inconsistent compliance.   C1 Compliance has an outstanding reputation assisting our clients to develop and implement comprehensive compliance strategies. Our team is committed to providing the cannabis industry with the expertise necessary to ensure your business maintains and exceeds cannabis laws and regulatory requirements from seed to sale.  Protect your Cannabis Supply Chain.  C1 Compliance is comprised of former Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) Special Agents, DEA Diversion Investigators, cannabis, security, and pharma compliance experts. C1 is a subsidiary of the Pharma Compliance Group (PCG), and for the past ten years, we have provided DEA regulatory expertise to the largest pharma manufacturers, wholesale drug distributors, and retail pharmacies. Our team members have extensive experience conducting regulatory inspections, evaluations, and investigations for the pharma and cannabis industry.  C1 has a strong reputation assisting our clients to develop and implement comprehensive management solutions. Our staff is committed to providing the cannabis industry with the expertise necessary to maintain effective compliance with federal, state, and local cannabis laws and regulations.

Description: BankFolio is a banking app that helps consumers to manage their bank accounts and cards.
Full Description: BankFolio is your automated financial and budgeting tool, created to make your finances quick and easy. BankFolio shows you all your accounts and transactions, helps you keep track of your subscriptions, provides you with monthly spending analysis, and much more! Your account and transaction data are NEVER stored nor shared with BankFolio or any third parties. You have complete control over your data privacy with bank-level security. FEATURES: ● Subscription tracking to help you identify subscriptions you pay for and when a charge is approaching. ● Deep spending analysis with up to 500 transactions or 1 year of your transaction history. ● A pie chart that automatically calculates your monthly top expense categories. ● Expense vs. income analysis on a month-to-month basis to help you budget. ● Export your transactions across all of your accounts into one comma-separated-value (CSV) file and conduct further analysis with your favorite spreadsheet software. ● Your equity overview with an up-to-date balance sheet. BankFolio does the math for you! ● A financial news feed filled with financial resources and financial tips. ● Loan tracking is supported for auto loans, commercial loans, consumer loans, home equity credit lines, mortgages, pre-approved overdraft accounts, pre-approved credit lines, and student loans. BANK-LEVEL SECURITY: ● BankFolio uses a combination of SSL 256-bit encryption, the same security protocol that banks use, and TLS, a more modern and secure version of SSL, to protect your data as it travels over the internet. ● The BankFolio app uses FaceID or TouchID fingerprint authentication to add security and privacy. ● BankFolio does not store nor has access to your banking credentials. Please refer to our FAQs at bankfolio.app/faq.

Description: Real Estate Technology
Full Description: Priority Real Estate Technology, LLC (PRET), is a wholly owned subsidiary of Priority Technology Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: PRTH). Formed in August 2018 by the acquisition and combination of two leading real estate technology brands: RadPad and LandlordStation. PRET will expand and accelerate these in-house brands while forming partnerships and making strategic acquisitions across the real estate technology space. PRET currently operates within two segments of the Multi-Family Real Estate Market: Consumer (Tenant) and Independent Landlords. The consumer brand, RadPad, provides end-to-end solutions for tenant apartment searches across the nation. RadPad includes listing services (ILS), leasing and brokerage services, mobile rent payments, and renter’s insurance. The leasing and brokerage services provide a critical “last mile” consumer interaction that compliments RadPad's native apps for both iOS and Android, as well as responsive web applications for desktop and mobile users. . PRET’s independent landlord brand, LandlordStation, provides tenant screening and other services to the majority of the independent landlord market. LandlordStation is a trusted brand in the landlord space that represents over 55% of the US rental market in buildings with fewer than 8 units; the fastest growing segment of the rental market. LandlordStation has approximately 80,000 landlord accounts within this segment.

Companies and users can manage documents, data, and consent flows and connect them to smart payment processes. XcooBee uses software-defined-workflows to dynamically create secure transactions at scale. This can be used to facilitate easy implementation of GDPR and CCPA requirements or any other business process that requires data and payments to be processed. For smaller businesses, our pre-built applications address specific use cases and take advantage of our platform to showcase its power. We have tools for many areas of your business. Our mission is not merely to simplify; it's to empower innovation. We seek to enable the solar industry with tools to focus on what truly counts—the advancement of renewable energy. We envision a world where solar energy isn't just an alternative; it's the standard. Solar installers and inspectors navigate a labyrinth of regulations and guidelines every day. Description: A First Nations co-founded and invested clean energy project development and asset management platform
Full Description: Kanata America, Inc., an affiliate of Kanata Clean Power & Climate Technologies Corp, is a project development and asset management platform that utilizes leading technologies and team capabilities to develop, build, own, and operate Net Zero and Net Negative CO2 emissions infrastructure. Kanata’s primary business objective is to be North America’s leading decarbonization technology platform, and Kanata’s core mission is to be a leader in economic reconciliation through the co-development of Net Zero and Net Negative CO2 emissions infrastructure with interested Tribal and First Nations. With an Net-Zero power generation anchored project announced in partnership with the Frog Lake First Nations in Alberta, Kanata is building a linked-platform of several carbon capture utilization and storage (CCUS) technologies that will utilize geologies and infrastructure ideal for carbon sequestration. Kanata was formed to accelerate the transition to low-carbon energy in partnership with North American Tribal and First Nations and specifically to build out zero-emission and carbon-capture infrastructure deploying a broad technology platform.  The Tribal and First Nations partnership is a foundational value of the company, with its first development, the Frog Lake project, proceeding under First Nations majority ownership. We are actively working to secure a Tribal stake in CCUS projects.

Description: ConnectOR's secure, mobile-first & web-based platform allows surgical teams to easily communicate & manage each patient’s surgical lifecycle
Full Description: Surgeries are complicated and ORs are some of the most expensive real estate in the world. Challenges come from all angles - from delayed start-times resulting in domino delays and overlapping cases to staff struggling to navigate complex, disconnected legacy systems, little frictions can lead to major ripples resulting in inefficiencies and unfavorable outcomes for providers and patients.  At ConnectOR, we've developed a suite of simple, integrated solutions that solve critical pain-points across the surgical journey. We start with our interconnected scheduling portal and team messaging modules that seamlessly push critical data to our surgical coordination platform for teams to stay informed and in sync. From informing patient families with automated, real-time procedure updates to empowering OR managers with valuable metrics on what matters most to your team, our intuitive modular platform and a forward-thinking product pipeline addresses challenges across your surgical workflow - creating value and reducing frictions for all our users from caregivers to administrators. The future of surgery is Connected.

Full Description: Always in Sight™ SpaceLink redraws the map of space connectivity with secure, continuous, high-capacity data relay service between satellites and the ground. Its innovative architecture in Medium Earth Orbit enables fast delivery of data from satellites and other spacecraft to dedicated ground stations and on to end users by Internet, private cloud, or other secure links. It addresses unmet market need by providing global coverage to empower space system operators to maximize use of their assets.  With SpaceLink, LEO satellite operators will have low latency, always on access to data, visitors to commercial space stations will have continuous communication capability, and satellite servicers or tugs can receive maneuvering instructions any time, because one of the SpaceLink satellites is always visible from anywhere in LEO. SpaceLink will meet pent up demand for fast and affordable access to the growing flood of data available from space.

Description: We help entrepreneurs to start a global business that knows no frontiers.
Full Description: We help entrepreneurs to start a global business that knows no frontiers, because we don't want the geographical barrier to be an impediment to new ideas that can change the world. Someone once said that an idea can change the world, and while at first it is hard to imagine the magnitude of what each person can achieve with their actions, one must always take the first step to make them a reality. At ezFrontiers we want to change the world, but the world of the entrepreneurs, and let them through their ideas make this world a better place for all of us. That is why we want everyone to know that to become an entrepreneur you don't need great things, just a great idea. We know that starting a business is possible for everyone who has the initiative, wherever they live, and that is what we seek to communicate. But not only that, which we do by training entrepreneurs through the content we publish on our various digital platforms, but we also seek to put it into practice. It's very easy to say that everything is simple, but to say it with foundation is something else very different. Thus, through the creation of companies in the United States, we seek to help entrepreneurs from all over the world, especially Spanish-speaking ones, to effectively carry out their projects, supporting them with the required procedures. For many it is complex, and we do not want bureaucratic obstacles to ruin an idea that, perhaps, can change the world. It's a first step, the rest is up to them, but we want to be there to do our bit. It is said that when undertaking the most important thing is to start, and we are very clear about that, because when we started this project, ezFrontiers, we also went through that stage. Creating a company for many sounds like something that is only reserved for executives with a tie or people with a lot of money who are in an office at the top of a building full of glass panels that make it look elegant, but no. On a day-to-day basis, SMEs are the drivers of every country's economy, they are the engine that generates jobs and changes the lives of millions of people. That is why we are motivated to liberalize the creation of companies, to make every entrepreneur see that there are no obstacles to start a business. That it does not matter their nationality, profession or way of thinking, because anyone, as long as they are over 18, can create a company to bring their ideas to life. And not only that, but working for them, because that is another issue that motivates us, working for oneself.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Professional Services

Description: Online Luxury Watch marketplace where you don't pay fees on selling and can connect freely with the buyer as well as well as seller s
Full Description: Our Story At Value Your Watch we’re passionate watch enthusiasts. We love the thrill of searching for that grail watch. Or finding hidden gems in the used market… But, let’s just face it. This hobby of ours can be a bit expensive. If it wasn’t because we could buy and sell watches, it wouldn’t be very fun to collect would it? However, we were getting increasingly frustrated with the options we had when buying and selling watches: — On the one hand, we could buy or sell watches on watch forums without being charged commission or fees. But with the number of fake watches being sold on those forums, and the fact that it can be really difficult to be sure who you’re actually dealing with, it also involves a high risk. Especially when it comes to investment pieces. — On the other hand, we could go to the major online marketplaces and watch sites, and base our buying decisions on reviews and ratings. But in that case, the site often charges a hefty fee or commission, making the price of watches unnecessarily expensive. — We couldn’t pursue this lifestyle of buying and selling watches, because the commissions would eat up our budget. The more watches we traded, the more expensive it would be. — And whats the fun in that? Many online marketplaces charge sellers unevenly… The way the fees and commissions are charged by many online marketplaces, hits private collectors, who just want to sell a single watch, much harder than large retailers, selling hundreds or thousands of watches. That might be great for business, but not really fair to the watch enthusiasts wanting to sell a watch to finance another purchase. We founded ValueYourWatch.com to offer a platform with high transparency, where watch enthusiasts can purchase watches with peace of mind. You won’t be charged any commissions! We wanted to create a marketplace where watch collectors could at least break even when buying and selling watches. So there’s no commissions pushing up the prices on any of the watches, only a low monthly subscription fee for sellers wanting to list several watches for sale. We wanted it to be fair for all sellers, so if you just want to list a single watch you will get your membership for FREE, and not be charged any fees.* — We believe that will benefit the retailers selling through Value Your Watch too, because we help watch lovers — their customers — get more funds for their next watch purchase. * In case you choose a payment processing party, like PayPal or Stripe, as your payment method,they might charge you a processing fee. But Value Your Watch will NOT be charging you anything. One Big Family of Enthusiastic Watch Lovers Our goal is to establish a community for selling and buying timepieces. So we encourage our sellers to link their Value Your Watch profile to their social media channels and show who they are. That way buyers can see who they are buying their new timepiece from, and it won’t just be an anonymous transaction. Our conditions are simple: Register your profile Select your plan (from $0 / month) Start selling!* * Unlike many other marketplaces you are allowed to sell listed watches outside of the platform. Value Your Watch is simply here to make it easier for watch lovers to buy and sell watches with more transparency.
Headquarters Regions: Asia-Pacific (APAC), Western US
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Community and Lifestyle

Full Description: RecSpot empowers people to seamlessly share what they love with their trusted network. Founded by serial entrepreneurs who have led or built for leading brands like Vogue, Amazon, SoulCycle, Equinox and Hermes, RecSpot will make sharing recommendations with your private network easy and fun.   Current social networks and recommendation platforms face eroding trust as they continue to be overwhelmed by trolls, bots, and unverified identities that flood them with fake reviews and loaded ratings. RecSpot is different. It is a platform that facilitates connecting to people you know and trust, where you get value sharing with few or many. It will replace the endless number of channels users bounce between for recommendations, to uniquely solve the frequent dilemma of where to eat/what to watch. By providing a visualization of your cultural universe,evolving as your tastes do, RecSpot will connect you in new ways. Full Description: Essayservice.io provides students and professionals with custom academic writing and editing services. The website provides a simple platform for customers to place orders for a variety of academic tasks, including essays, research papers, term papers, case studies, dissertations, and more. The writing workforce at Essayservice.io consists of highly skilled professionals with advanced degrees in a wide range of areas. They've authored scholarly papers in APA, MLA, Harvard, and Chicago citation styles, among others. Customers may choose a writer based on their credentials and skills, and then work directly with them to ensure that their specific needs and preferences are met. The website also includes a number of extra services like as plagiarism detection, limitless revisions, and a money-back guarantee. Essayservice.io's customer support team is ready 24/7 to help clients with any inquiries or problems they may have. The website is designed to allow clients to quickly follow the status of their orders and contact with their authors at any time. Furthermore, Essayservice values consumer confidentiality. They have rigorous privacy measures in place to protect their clients' personal and academic information. All transactions and interactions are encrypted, and customer data is safeguarded against unauthorised access. Essay service  also provides extra benefits such as limitless revisions to ensure that clients are completely happy with the final essay. They also allow clients to communicate directly with the assigned writer, allowing them to offer extra instructions or clarify any issues that may arise throughout the writing process. Overall, Essay Service is one of the top essay writing services in the United States because of its commitment to quality, expertise, and client happiness. Description: Second-hand clothing search engine
Full Description: Easy Street is a mens second-hand clothing search engine with a mission to help fashion enthusiasts find used designer clothing at a fair price in an effort to encourage sustainability. As environmentally conscious consumers hunt for second-hand clothing online, sorting through and comparing hundreds of listings across dozens of marketplaces to find wishlist items becomes a daunting task. Easy Street saves consumers time and money by aggregating listings and providing price comparisons across many second-hand marketplaces.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Seattle Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Clothing and Apparel, Commerce and Shopping, Design, Internet Services

Industries: Employee Benefits, Group Buying, Health Care, Internet, Supply Chain Management
Description: SubPop is the first group purchasing organization for employers for healthcare services.
Full Description: SubPop Health (SubPop) enables employers to control the $1.2 trillion in spending they make annually on healthcare benefits. Employer-sponsored healthcare accounts for half of US healthcare costs and is usually an employer's largest expense aside from wages. Rising costs have prompted employers to restructure their benefits with higher employee premiums and larger deductibles. Employer-sponsored coverage costs 224% more than Medicare for the same services from the same providers. This dynamic is the result of various intermediaries who stand between the employer and their employees on one hand and high-value care providers on the other. Employers have reached a tipping point. They have reached the limit on the financial responsibility they can offload to their employees. New organizations built to take risks by delivering high-value care are looking to contract directly with employers. The Consolidated Appropriations Act (CAA) raises the fiduciary duties of employers to spend healthcare dollars effectively. SubPop is the first group purchasing organization for employers for healthcare services. SubPop leverages market-level purchasing power to give employers agency, improve their ability to purchase high-value healthcare benefits at reasonable prices, and increase transparency in the healthcare industry - all while providing providers direct access to purchasers who have traditionally had to wade through expensive and inefficient channels. Employers can use our tools to identify opportunities in their claims history and then find and evaluate high-value providers. SubPop aggregates purchasing power to get the best contracts. SubPop measures provider performance against contractual obligations to improve provider selection. SubPop is the only complete aggregation and specification solution for employers. We have a partnership with the Purchaser Business Group on Health (PBGH), a purchasing collaborative representing nearly 40 private employers and public entities that spend $350 billion annually on healthcare for over 21 million Americans. Chris Gormley, the CEO, and co-founder of SubPop, has successfully built and led healthcare technology platforms and purchasing organizations. He has previously worked at FreeMarkets (acquired by Ariba), GE Healthcare, Medpricer (acquired by Premier), and Premier.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Commerce and Shopping, Health Care, Internet Services, Transportation
